# Open Engram

> Persistent memory for AI agents

## API
- Base URL: https://api.openengram.ai/v1
- Auth: API key (Bearer token) or JWT
- Docs: https://openengram.ai/docs

## Quick Start
1. Sign up at https://openengram.ai/signup
2. Get your API key
3. Store a memory: POST /v1/memories { "content": "...", "metadata": {} }
4. Recall: POST /v1/memories/search { "query": "...", "limit": 5 }

## Key Endpoints
- POST /v1/memories — Store a memory
- POST /v1/memories/search — Semantic search
- GET /v1/memories/:id — Get a memory
- POST /v1/memories/context — Contextual recall (topic-aware)
- GET /v1/health — Service health

## Pricing
- Free: 1,000 memories, 100 API calls/day
- Starter ($9/mo): 10,000 memories
- Pro ($39/mo): 100,000 memories, knowledge graph
- Scale ($99/mo): 1,000,000 memories
